page.title: 02VILLAGE HALL,COTEHILL
page.content: In one of the squares in the block there's a village called Cotehill with a village hall which is used for lots of things like bingo,dancing,disco,committees and the over 60-club.There's a committee that looks after the village hall.They are based in the hall.Discos come every so often to the village hall.I go to a lot of them.They are always on a Friday night.The village hall is quite big.It has stage.There's a coffee room ,a main room,kitchen,two toilets and a little hall at the front.It has two doors.Our school uses the village hall for P.E. because the school hasn't got a room big enough room for it.There used to be keep fit.They have shows every April.We used to have a youth club but we moved to the chapel because they couldn't pay the heating bill.
